title: Marc：今天放出恶棍地图存档
author: zx728925
txt_content:
本帖最后由 WuGuangYao2012 于 2016-8-12 22:07 编辑 

Marc：MCPE players are always telling me they want some new content, so here's the villains map from today! https://aka.ms/villains
Marc：MCPE的玩家总是告诉我他们想要一些新的地图，所以这是今天的主题地图！https://aka.ms/villains
[attach]973223[/attach]

然而我已经把这个存档下载了，并上传到了百度网盘：http://pan.baidu.com/s/1nv0aye9

注意这是PE存档！
